name: Deactivate an account for a national ID having no bank account
scenarioId: classpath:features/user/deactivate_user:Deactivate an account for a national ID having no bank account
methodName: Deactivate an account for a national ID having no bank account

testSteps.description: Given the client identification for document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "34khj543k", country "PT"
And there is a client with this document information
And there is no client account
When the user deactivation is requested
Then the client's account is deactivated

reportData.title: User Deactivation Response
reportData.contents: <200 OK OK,RestResponse(message=null, data={id=427fa016-deb4-4ad5-b115-b83681c439f0, name=ANOTHER_NAME, surname=ANOTHER_SURNAME, docType=NATIONAL_ID, document=34khj543k, docCountry=PT, status=DEACTIVATED, account=null}),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Thu, 26 Dec 2024 05:34:46 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
The Tiny User Bank can at any moment choose to close its account in the Tiny Bank. The user is not deleted from the bank
  data records. It is deactivated to allow future data verification. The user deactivation and user account deactivation
  are done in the same operation.

  **As a** client that has an account at Tiny Bank
  **I want to** request the account deactivation
  **So that I can** end my relationship with the bank

title: Deactivate an account for a national ID having no bank account

rule.name: When a Tiny Bank client request to deactivate its account, based on the clients national ID the deactivation is done.
